heading: Monday Night
text: Evening showers likely east of the Greens, scattered west; showers retracting  into the northern mountains overnight, while mixing with snow and diminishing. Partial clearing in southern valleys. Lows from the mid 30s to around 40, some lower 30s in the Adirondacks. Southwest winds becoming west 10 to 20 mph, and gusting to 35 mph.

heading: Tuesday
text: Partly cloudy, except mostly sunny in southeastern valleys, and mostly cloudy in the northern mountains, with the chance of rain or snow showers. Highs from the mid 40s to lower 50s north, low to mid 50s in the south. West to northwest winds 10 to 20 mph, gusting to 40 mph.

heading: Tuesday Night
text: Clear to partly cloudy early, except clouds decreasing in the northern mountains, then clouds increasing all areas late. Lows from the mid 30s to around 40, except upper 20s to lower 30s northeast. Northwest winds 10 to 15 mph, gusting to 25 mph early, then diminishing.
